Publication Title: 2020 28th Signal Processing and Communications Applications Conference (SIU)
Abstract: Wide usage of biometric authentication systems engages attackers. Face presentation attacks try to deceive the machine learning-based system via malicious inputs to the sensor employing tools such as a face mask or photo. Presentation attacks threaten the deployment of face recognition systems to the real-world since security is a priority for an authentication system. In this paper, we propose a Convolutional Long Short Term Memory (ConvLSTM) based Spatiotemporal Autoencoder model. The proposed model only employs the real samples to train the model by minimizing the reconstruction error. The model learns to reconstruct real samples; thus, reconstruct attack samples with higher reconstruction error. The model classifies whether a sample is genuine or not via the scoring function based on the reconstruction error. The proposed model reduces the half total error rate by 22% compared to the commonly used methods in the literature.

Abstract: A Cyber-Physical System (CPS) is usually composed of subnetworks where each subnetwork is under ownership of one defender. We model such CPS using hybrid input/output automaton (HIOA) where each subnetwork is represented by a HIOA module. We first establish the building blocks needed in our setting. Abstract: In recent times, ransomware has become the most significant cyber-attack targeting individuals, enterprises, healthcare industries, and the Internet of Things (IoT). Existing security systems like Intrusion Detection and Prevention System (IDPS) and Anti-virus (AV) as a single monitoring agent is complicated and time-consuming, thus fails in ransomware detection. A robust Intrusion Detection Honeypot (IDH) is proposed to address the issues mentioned above. IDH consists of i) Honeyfolder, ii) Audit Watch, and iii) Complex Event Processing (CEP). Honeyfolder is a decoy folder modeled using Social Leopard Algorithm (SoLA), especially for getting attacked and acting as an early warning system to alert the user during the suspicious file activities. AuditWatch is an Entropy module that verifies the entropy of the files and folders. CEP engine is used to aggregate data from different security systems to confirm the ransomware behavior, attack pattern, and promptly respond to them. The proposed IDH is experimentally tested in a secured testbed using more than 20 variants of recent ransomware of all types. The experimental result confirms that the proposed IDH significantly improves the ransomware detection time, rate, and accuracy compared with the existing state of the art ransomware detection model.

In this paper, we address the challenge of designing and deploying in a real operational setting an efficient privacy-preserving explorer for genetic cohorts. Evaluation results show that ATTAIN improved the performance of two state-of-art anomaly detection methods by 2.413%, 8.487%, and 5.438% on average on the three datasets, respectively. Moreover, ATTAIN achieved on average 8.39% increase in the anomaly detection capability with digital twins as compared with an approach of not using digital twins.
